definition: variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)

sentences.english: There is difference of single and heterogeneous in incline of the self-urge poetry and the self-sorrow poetry.
sentences.chinese: 自勵詩和自悼詩的思想傾向有單一和駁雜之分。

sentences.english: This book is a heterogeneous mass of information, being three parts history and seven parts science.
sentences.chinese: 這本書三分歷史，七分科學，內容非常駁雜。
